name: repeatme
0:
”Alexa, repeat me”
”shout the dinner is ready”
”say dinner is ready”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: repeat me
des: It is always fun when you are sitting in a group of friends and make fun of a friend by letting Alexa say something in sarcasm.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
